data_table.description: Brain MRI Measurements Method 2, Original, Offspring, Generation Cohorts, New Offspring Spouse, Omni 1, and Omni 2 (all cohorts). Brain MRI was performed between 6/2009 to 12/2013 to establish baseline measures of brain morphology and cognitive function. Two methods have been used to read brain MRIs at Framingham to date. Method 1 is an older method and is no longer being used. Method 2 is a new method. Method 2 did not start until 2009. There are some MRI scans that have been read using both methods. Note that when this is true, the measurements may differ. This dataset contains scans read using Method 2.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form the study participant's ID number.

variable.name: TCV
variable.description: Total cranial volume

variable.name: LLV
variable.description: Traced left lateral ventricle volume

variable.name: IIC
variable.description: Segmented third ventricle volume

variable.name: LLC
variable.description: Segmented left lateral ventricle volume

variable.name: III
variable.description: Traced third ventricle volume

variable.name: Manual_WMH
variable.description: Segmented white matter hyperintensities volume

variable.name: TLV
variable.description: Total lateral ventricle volume

variable.name: RLV
variable.description: Traced right lateral ventricle volume

variable.name: TCB
variable.description: Total hemispheric brain volume

variable.name: RLC
variable.description: Traced right lateral ventricle volume

variable.name: TCC
variable.description: Total hemispheric cerebrospinal fluid

variable.name: Check__TCV_TCB_TCC_
variable.description: Check (TCV-TCB-TCC) - to check if TCV is very close to TCB+TCC

variable.name: MDT3_Frontal_Mask_csf
variable.description: Frontal lobe CSF volume in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Frontal_Mask_gray
variable.description: Frontal lobe gray volume in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Frontal_Mask_white
variable.description: Frontal lobe white matter volume in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Occipital_Mask_csf
variable.description: Occipital lobe CSF volume in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Occipital_Mask_gray
variable.description: Occipital lobe gray volume in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Occipital_Mask_white
variable.description: Occipital lobe white matter volume in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Parietal_Mask_csf
variable.description: Parietal lobe CSF volume in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Parietal_Mask_gray
variable.description: Parietal lobe gray volume in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Parietal_Mask_white
variable.description: Parietal lobe white matter volume in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Temporal_Mask_csf
variable.description: Temporal lobe CSF volume in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Temporal_Mask_gray
variable.description: Temporal lobe gray volume in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Temporal_Mask_white
variable.description: Temporal lobe white matter volume in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Total_Mask_gray_woCRBL
variable.description: Total brain gray matter without cerebellum in native image space

variable.name: MDT3_Total_Mask_white_woCRBL
variable.description: Total brain white matter without cerebellum in native image space

variable.name: CSF
variable.description: Total brain CSF volume in native image space

variable.name: Gray
variable.description: Total brain gray matter volume in native image space

variable.name: White
variable.description: Total brain white matter volume in native image space

variable.name: Auto_WMH
variable.description: Total brain white matter hyperintensity volume in native image space

variable.name: Total
variable.description: Total brain volume in native image space

variable.name: Gray_White
variable.description: Gray/White ratio

variable.name: Status
variable.description: MRI scan status

variable.name: mri_date
variable.description: Date of MRI scan
variable.comment: Only month and year part of date are presented in coding manual to preserve study participant confidentiality. Full date in included in the dataset.
